title: Check for Leap Year
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamental concepts of JavaScript programming. Through a series of exercises, you will learn how to write basic JavaScript programs, including variables, data types, functions, and control flow structures. By the end of the lab, you will have a solid foundation in JavaScript programming and be able to apply your knowledge to solve real-world problems.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
